sentences.english: A axle of blast furnace charging wagon broke in use.
sentences.chinese: 高爐上料車車軸在使用過程中發生斷裂。

sentences.english: Production costs and pollution can be reduced in iron-smelting by means of SAD in small blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 小高爐使用硫酸渣鍊鐵能降低生產成本，減少污染。

sentences.english: The blast furnace slag is grinded to have the granularity the same as that of the cement.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣粉需要磨細，粒度與水泥粒度相同。

sentences.english: The paper summarizes the new technologies adopted in No. 1 BF of Xiangtan Iron and Steel Co.
sentences.chinese: 對湘鋼1號高爐採用的新技術進行了總結分析。

sentences.english: Also "blast home" to meet the "bull" in foreshadowing the arrival of a new vision.
sentences.chinese: 也爲“高爐家”迎接“牛”年的到來鋪墊新的願景。

sentences.english: There are no artificial colors of flavors in our Meat Blast Brand Twists.
sentences.chinese: 有沒有在我們的口味高爐品牌彎人造肉的顏色。

sentences.english: The bosh becomes larger from the tuyeres up to the maximum internal diameter of the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 爐腹從風口開始上至高爐口徑最大處變得大起來。

sentences.english: Taphole driller is a key equipment to open the taphole blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 開鐵口機是完成打開高爐鐵口操作的關鍵設備。

sentences.english: Ground granulate blast furnace slag (GGBFS) is a by-product of the iron and steel manufacturing industry.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣是中國鋼鐵業大量排放的一種冶金廢渣。

sentences.english: Furnace grate is a main part of hot blast stove.
sentences.chinese: 爐箅子是高爐熱風爐的重要部件之一。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of sinter degradation takes place in the upper shaft of blast furnaces.
sentences.chinese: 燒結礦在高爐爐身上部會發生低溫還原粉化現象。

sentences.english: Mine is back to Cold Blast Whole system of screening.
sentences.chinese: 冷返礦是整粒系統高爐槽下篩分出的。

sentences.english: Blast furnace is a complex metallurgical reactor with gas-solid counter flow.
sentences.chinese: 高爐是一個複雜的氣固向流反應器。

sentences.english: Analyzed the effects of protection of titanium-bearing pellet ore on the parameters of blast furnace production.
sentences.chinese: 分析了鈦球護爐對高爐生產各種參數的影響。

sentences.english: The research of the application of continuous analysis technique in blast furnace top comprehensive gas has been introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了攀鋼高爐爐頂綜合煤氣連續分析技術應用研究。

sentences.english: The feasibility of admixing blast furnace gas to spreader-stoker-coal fired boilers is being discussed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了拋煤機鍋爐摻燒高爐煤氣的可行性。
